page.name: Hosted Private Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Hosted Private Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Hosted Private Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Hosted Private Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [RBX8][Managed vSphere] - Rack R808R22 incident notification
incidents.message: We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed vSphere has been resolved. Start time : 29/09/2025 09:15 UTC End time : 29/09/2025 11:50 UTC Root Cause : The incident was caused by this maintenance: https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/cl52tdqjft1x We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [RBX2d][Managed vSphere] - Cluster11012 incident notification
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that we had an incident on the specific Cluster11012 in RBX2d. This incident has now been resolved. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 29/09/2025 08:40 UTC End time : 29/09/2025 08:54 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Cluster11012 was temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access their data on the specified cluster. Root Cause : This incident was caused by the maintenance described below https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/vpgjv44vg7hz We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.name: [RBX2d][Managed vSphere] - Cluster11012 incident notification
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that we had an incident on the specific Cluster11012 in RBX2d. This incident has now been resolved. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
